1.description: First, create the blade, positioning it as the central feature of the object, which will define its primary function. This blade serves as the essential cutting component, providing the sharp edge needed for effective performance and setting the overall aesthetic of the object.

2.description: Finally, add the handle to the base of the blade, ensuring it is securely attached to provide a comfortable grip for the user. This handle not only balances the knife but also enhances usability, allowing for better control and leverage during cutting tasks.
